Molly F-Droid Repo

The official Molly repository for F-Droid, that mirrors the latest releases found on GitHub at https://github.com/mollyim/mollyim-android/releases.

Currently it serves 1 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://molly.im/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
3B 7E 93 B1 FE 32 C6 E3 5A 93 D6 DD FC 5A FB EB 12 39 A7 C6 EA 6A F2 0F F3 3E D5 3C DC 38 B0 4A
